name: Eternal Space Rogue
description:
Fight to survive on an isolated space station surrounded by hostile aliens. Wield massive weapons, run out of ammo, run away screaming, and die horribly all alone with no-one to rescue you.

Then try again!

ESR is a hardcore iron man roguelike. There is no saving, respawning, or chance of survival. If you survive, it's obviously a delusional fantasy caused by the stream of gruesome deaths you've experienced. You can just try to do better than last time.

The gameplay is highly tactical, with a wide variety of weapons and limited ammo which you must master and use efficiently to even stand a chance.

Made for the 7DRL (7 day roguelike) games jam 2023!

Controls:

Movement;

WASD/Arrows - movement

C - end move

Combat:

WASD/Arrows - aiming (you can only shoot in straight lines)

Z - Switch between weapon and fist

X - Discard weapon

C - Move again instead of attacking

Audio stutter: Sometimes the audio will stutter in the Web build (mostly just on level load) - if you find it annoying, the Windows build doesn't have this problem.
